name: Cooking Decor - Home Design
description:
Looking for a new creative hobby?
Play Cooking Decor Game today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator and a top chef in our 5-star madness restaurants as well.

Experience the most SPECIAL FEATURES:
- Addictive game play with home design game
- You are the one who makes decisions, choose what you like and own your living space
- Sharpen your decorating skills by decorating different spaces: Living room, Bedroom, Kitchen, Bathroom, Pool, Garden.
- Design and renovate your house in different styles: classic, simple, trendy or modern.
- Enjoy the most diverse and realistic home space.

The SUPER HOT from the fast cooking restaurants
- Transform into a MASTER CHEF
- Own the largest 5-star madness restaurant chain in the world
- Cook hundreds of recipes from many countries
- Fry, Boil, Bake, let’s cook the best dishes
- Serve both cute or fastidious customers

HOW TO PLAY
- Touch the screen to cook and decorate home
- Choose the best house designing styles you like
- Use gold and stars to unlock the interior furniture in each room
- Get special rewards and gifts every day

Your partner in the Cooking Decor game is Linsa - she is a talented chef and also loves decorating and designing houses like you. But now her fast-food restaurant chain business is in trouble and she needs your help.
Your main mission is to make great food to serve customers around the world. Besides, the new design cooking game is also the place where you show your passion to design dream houses in your own way.

This cooking and designing home game FOR FREE provides you with fresh ingredients to make special and delicious dishes. The dream houses with modern equipment and full of furniture help your creative designing home ideas be shown clearly.

We love your fast-food and look forward to the unique home decorations and renovations in your living space

Download and get started today! Design and decorate the beautiful houses you've always wished for!
